alert.note: Alert for Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 2:57PM EST until January 14 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Washington County. In Virginia, Frederick VA, Warren and Clarke Counties, and Northern Virginia Blue Ridge. In West Virginia, Morgan, Berkeley and Jefferson Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
